attributes.action: Have Head teachers elected every 2 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Head Teachers would work better if their jobs depended on parents. If a Head Teacher was incompetent the parents of the children of that school could vote for another Head Teacher.

This would decentralise the education system and make it more localised and make Head Teachers accountable for their actions. This would also allow parents to have more of a say in their child’s education.
